radiographic_examinations.findings: Acute obstructive hydrocephalus with ventricular synechiae at the sylvian aqueduct and foramen of Magendie.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Three weeks later showed hydrocephalus improvement and lesser white matter signal abnormality. Synechiae had resolved and there was CSF flow void signal.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Hydrocephalus improvement and lesser white matter signal abnormality.
